verses.verse: <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> an <S%G652>apostle<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> to the <S%G3927>strangers<s%> scattered <S%G1290>throughout<s%> <S%G4195>Pontus,<s%> <S%G1053>Galatia,<s%> <S%G2587>Cappadocia,<s%> <S%G773>Asia,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G978>Bithynia,<s%>

Elect according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G4268>foreknowledge<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%>, <S%G1722>through<s%> <S%G38>sanctification<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>, <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G5218>obedience<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4473>sprinkling<s%> of the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>: <S%G5485>Grace<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%>, be <S%G4129>multiplied<s%>.

<S%G2128>Blessed<s%> be the <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2962>of<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G3588>who<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4183>abundant<s%> <S%G1656>mercy<s%> has <S%G313>fathered<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G313>again<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> a <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%>,

<S%G1519>To<s%> an <S%G2817>inheritance<s%> <S%G862>incorruptible<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G283>undefiled<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> that fades not <S%G263>away<s%>, <S%G5083>reserved<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>,

<S%G3588>Who<s%> are <S%G5432>kept<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G2092>ready<s%> to be <S%G601>revealed<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%>.

<S%G1722>Where<s%> you greatly <S%G21>rejoice<s%>, though <S%G737>now<s%> for a <S%G3641>season<s%>, <S%G1487>if<s%> need <S%G1163>be<s%>, you <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G3076>grieved<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G4164>various<s%> <S%G3986>trials<s%>:

<S%G2443>That<s%> the <S%G1383>trial<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>, being <S%G4183>much<s%> more precious <S%G5093>than<s%> of <S%G5553>gold<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G622>perishes<s%>, <S%G1161>though<s%> it be <S%G1381>tried<s%> <S%G1223>with<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%>, might be <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G1868>praise<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5092>honor<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G602>appearing<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>:

<S%G3739>Whom<s%> <S%G1492>having<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1492>seen<s%>, you <S%G25>love<s%>; <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%>, though <S%G737>now<s%> you <S%G3708>see<s%> him <S%G3361>not<s%>, <S%G1161>yet<s%> <S%G4100>believing<s%>, you <S%G21>rejoice<s%> with <S%G5479>joy<s%> <S%G412>unspeakable<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> full of <S%G1392>glory<s%>:
<S%G2865>Receiving<s%> the <S%G5056>end<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>, even the <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G5590>of<s%> your <S%G5590>souls<s%>.

<S%G4012>Of<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> have <S%G1567>inquired<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> searched <S%G1830>diligently<s%>, who <S%G4395>prophesied<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> that should come <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>:

<S%G2045%G99999>Searching<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> what manner <S%G4169>of<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> did <S%G1213>signify<s%>, when it <S%G4303>testified<s%> beforehand the <S%G3804>sufferings<s%> <S%G1519>of<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G5023>that<s%> should <S%G3326>follow<s%>.

Unto <S%G3739>whom<s%> it was <S%G601>revealed<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> unto <S%G1438>themselves<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> unto <S%G2254>us<s%> they did <S%G1247>minister<s%> the <S%G846>things<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G312>are<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G312>reported<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3588>them<s%> that have preached the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> unto <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> sent <S%G649>down<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>; which <S%G3739>things<s%> the <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G1937>desire<s%> to <S%G3879>look<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%>.

<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> <S%G328%G99999>prepare<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1271>mind<s%>, be <S%G3525>sober<s%>, and <S%G1679>hope<s%> to the <S%G5049>end<s%> <S%G1909>for<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> that is to be <S%G5342>brought<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G602>revelation<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>;

<S%G5613>As<s%> <S%G5218>obedient<s%> <S%G5043>sons<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> fashioning yourselves according <S%G4964>to<s%> the <S%G4386>former<s%> <S%G1939>lusts<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G52>ignorance<s%>:

<S%G235>But<s%> <S%G2596>as<s%> he who has <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> is <S%G40>holy<s%>, <S%G2532>so<s%> <S%G1096%G99999>be<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> manner of <S%G391>living<s%>;
<S%G1360>Because<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%>, <S%G1096>Be<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%>; <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> you call <S%G1941>on<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%>, <S%G3588>who<s%> without respect of <S%G678>persons<s%> <S%G2919>judges<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> every <S%G1538>man<s%>'s <S%G2041>work<s%>, <S%G390>pass<s%> the <S%G5550>time<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3940>staying<s%> here as strangers <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%>:

Forasmuch as you <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> you <S%G3084>were<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3084>redeemed<s%> with corruptible <S%G5349>things<s%>, as <S%G694>silver<s%> <S%G2228>and<s%> <S%G5553>gold<s%>, <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3152>vain<s%> <S%G391>way<s%> of life received by tradition from your <S%G3970>fathers<s%>;
<S%G235>But<s%> with the <S%G5093>precious<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> of a <S%G286>lamb<s%> without <S%G299>blemish<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> without <S%G784>spot<s%>:

Who <S%G3303>truly<s%> was <S%G4267>foreordained<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> the <S%G2602>foundation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> was <S%G5319>revealed<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> these <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G5550>times<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>,

<S%G3588>Who<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> do <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G1453>raised<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1453>up<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%>; <S%G5620>that<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> might <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>.

Seeing you have <S%G48>purified<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5590>souls<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5218>obeying<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G505>unfeigned<s%> love of the <S%G5360>brothers<s%>, see that you <S%G25>love<s%> one <S%G240>another<s%> <S%G1537>with<s%> a <S%G2513>pure<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> <S%G1619>fervently<s%>:

Being born <S%G313>again<s%>, <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5349>corruptible<s%> <S%G4701>seed<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> of <S%G862>incorruptible<s%>, <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, which <S%G2198>lives<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3306>stays<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>ever<s%>.

<S%G1360>For<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> is <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G5528>grass<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G438>flower<s%> of <S%G5528>grass<s%>. The <S%G5528>grass<s%> <S%G3583>withers<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G438>flower<s%> <S%G846>there<s%> falls <S%G1601>away<s%>:

<S%G1161>But<s%> the <S%G4487>word<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3306>endures<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>ever<s%>. <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G4487>word<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> by the gospel is <S%G2097>preached<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>.
